info.report-description: LTE VLAN PHB statistics measurement (M51128) contains PM counters to monitor the performance of the IP Iub functionality per VLAN interface for each per hop behaviour.

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_EF (M51128C0)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets that were successfully transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_EF (M51128C1)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_EF (M51128C2)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_EF (M51128C3)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF4 (M51128C4)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets that were successfully transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF4 (M51128C5)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets that were successfully transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF4 (M51128C6)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF4 (M51128C7)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF3 (M51128C8)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF3 (M51128C9)
kpi_info.use: he number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class that were successfully transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF3 (M51128C10)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF3 (M51128C11)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF2 (M51128C12)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF2 (M51128C13)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class that were successfully transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF2 (M51128C14)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF2 (M51128C15)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_AF1 (M51128C16)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_AF1 (M51128C17)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class that were successfully transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_AF1 (M51128C18)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_AF1 (M51128C19)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifOctets_BE (M51128C20)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Best Effort PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifPackets_BE (M51128C21)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Best Effort PHB class that were transmitted over the VLAN interface within the Best Effort PHB class. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is transmitted within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedOctets_BE (M51128C22)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound kilo-octets within the Best Effort PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet of outbound data needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifDroppedPackets_BE (M51128C23)
kpi_info.use: The number of outbound packets within the Best Effort PHB class that were dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet needs to be dropped due to congestion within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_EF (M51128C24)
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received on the VLAN interface for the Expedited Forwarding PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_EF (M51128C25)
kpi_info.use: The total number of packets received on the VLAN interface for the Expedited Forwarding PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF4 (M51128C26)
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF4 (M51128C27)
kpi_info.use: The total number of packets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 4 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF3 (M51128C28)
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF3 (M51128C29)
kpi_info.use: The total number of packets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 3 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF2 (M51128C30)
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF2 (M51128C31)
kpi_info.use: The total number of packets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_AF1 (M51128C32)
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_AF1 (M51128C33)
kpi_info.use: The total number of packets received on the VLAN interface for the Assured Forwarding 1 PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxOctets_BE (M51128C34)
kpi_info.use: The total number of kilo-octets received on the VLAN interface for the Best Effort PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a kilo-octet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: ifRxPackets_BE (M51128C35)
kpi_info.use: The total number of packets received on the VLAN interface for the Best Effort PHB class. The counter includes framing characters. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a packet is received within the PHB class.

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
